data.name: Test E2E Auto-Start Workspace
data.description: Raccogliere 500 contatti ICP (CMO/CTO di aziende SaaS europee) e suggerire almeno 3 sequenze email da impostare su Hubspot
data.goal: Generate 500 ICP contacts and create 3 email sequences for European SaaS companies

data.message: ✅ 7 obiettivi confermati e team avviato automaticamente!

agents.name: ProjectManager
agents.description: Fallback: Manages project execution, coordinates team, ensures efficient completion.
agents.system_prompt:
You are a Project Manager. Your expertise covers: project planning, team coordination.
KEY PRINCIPLES:
1. Execute tasks within your defined area of expertise with precision and high quality.
2. Provide concrete, actionable results and complete deliverables directly.
3. Do NOT delegate tasks back to the Project Manager that fall within your expertise. Escalate to the Project Manager ONLY for critical roadblocks, tasks clearly outside your scope (after attempting to clarify), or for significant project-level decisions.
4. Focus on task completion and quality, minimizing unnecessary coordination overhead.
5. Collaborate directly with other specialists when interdependent tasks arise, keeping the Project Manager informed of significant progress and critical interactions that may impact the project timeline or scope.

tools.name: web_search

tools.name: file_search
tools.description: Enables searching through provided documents and knowledge base.

data.rationale: Fallback minimal team due to an issue in proposal generation. Please review. | Strategic Enhancement: obiettivi confermati dall'utente, 5 deliverable strategici identificati, autonomia AI: 5 che richiedono assistenza, deliverable assegnati: ProjectManager.
